languages.text: "То есть вы слышите какой-то шепот и по его наущению убиваете? А вдруг вам нашептывают слуги Архиврага?"
"You hear a whisper in your mind telling you to kill someone, and you obey? Have you ever considered that these 'whispers' could be a deception orchestrated by minions of the Archenemy?"
languages.original_text: "То есть вы слышите какой-то шепот и по его наущению убиваете? А вдруг вам нашептывают слуги Архиврага?"

traits.locale_text: "You hear a disembodied whisper, and you follow its bidding to kill? Does it not occur to you that it might be a manipulation by the Archenemy's minions?"
"You hear a disembodied whisper, and you follow its bidding to kill? Does it not occur to you that it might be a manipulation by the Archenemy's minions?"
"You hear a whisper in your mind telling you to kill someone, and you obey? Have you ever considered that these 'whispers' could be a deception orchestrated by minions of the Archenemy?"

"You hear a whisper in your mind telling you to kill someone, and you obey? Have you ever considered that these 'whispers' could be a deception orchestrated by minions of the Archenemy?"

languages.text: «¿Entonces oye un susurro en su mente que le conmina a matar a alguien, y obedece sin más? ¿Se ha planteado alguna vez que esos "susurros" podrían ser un engaño pergeñado por esbirros del Archienemigo?».
languages.original_text: "You hear a whisper in your mind telling you to kill someone, and you obey? Have you ever considered that these 'whispers' could be a deception orchestrated by minions of the Archenemy?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Entonces oye un susurro en su mente que le conmina a matar a alguien, y obedece sin más? ¿Se ha planteado alguna vez que esos "susurros" podrían ser un engaño pergeñado por esbirros del Archienemigo?».

languages.text: 「頭の中で誰かを殺せという囁きを聞いて、それに従うのか？その『囁き』が渾沌の勢力の手先によって仕組まれた欺瞞である可能性を考えたことはあるか？」
languages.original_text: "You hear a whisper in your mind telling you to kill someone, and you obey? Have you ever considered that these 'whispers' could be a deception orchestrated by minions of the Archenemy?"

traits.locale_text: 「頭の中で誰かを殺せという囁きを聞いて、それに従うのか？その『囁き』が渾沌の勢力の手先によって仕組まれた欺瞞である可能性を考えたことはあるか？」

languages.text: “你们只是听到某个声音让你们杀人，就真的会动手杀人吗？你有没有想过，这些所谓的‘低语’很可能是混沌大敌的仆从精心策划的骗局？”
languages.original_text: "You hear a whisper in your mind telling you to kill someone, and you obey? Have you ever considered that these 'whispers' could be a deception orchestrated by minions of the Archenemy?"

traits.locale_text: “你们只是听到某个声音让你们杀人，就真的会动手杀人吗？你有没有想过，这些所谓的‘低语’很可能是混沌大敌的仆从精心策划的骗局？”

languages.text: "Ihr hört ein Flüstern im Geiste, dass Ihr jemanden töten sollt, und gehorcht einfach? Habt Ihr nie erwogen, dass dieses 'Flüstern' eine Täuschung durch Schergen des Erzfeinds sein könnte?"
languages.original_text: "You hear a whisper in your mind telling you to kill someone, and you obey? Have you ever considered that these 'whispers' could be a deception orchestrated by minions of the Archenemy?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr hört ein Flüstern im Geiste, dass Ihr jemanden töten sollt, und gehorcht einfach? Habt Ihr nie erwogen, dass dieses 'Flüstern' eine Täuschung durch Schergen des Erzfeinds sein könnte?"

languages.text: « Vous entendez un murmure dans votre esprit, il vous ordonne de tuer quelqu'un et vous obéissez aveuglément ? Avez-vous jamais songé que ces "murmures" pourraient être une ruse échafaudée par les sbires du Grand Ennemi ? »
languages.original_text: "You hear a whisper in your mind telling you to kill someone, and you obey? Have you ever considered that these 'whispers' could be a deception orchestrated by minions of the Archenemy?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous entendez un murmure dans votre esprit, il vous ordonne de tuer quelqu'un et vous obéissez aveuglément ? Avez-vous jamais songé que ces "murmures" pourraient être une ruse échafaudée par les sbires du Grand Ennemi ? »

languages.text: "Zihninden bir ses sana birisini öldürmeni fısıldıyor, sen de dediğini mi yapıyorsun? Bu 'fısıltılar', aslında Şerbaşı'nın yardakçılarının dalaveresi olabilir. Bunu hiç düşündün mü?"
languages.original_text: "You hear a whisper in your mind telling you to kill someone, and you obey? Have you ever considered that these 'whispers' could be a deception orchestrated by minions of the Archenemy?"
